description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央宣传部副部长、国家互联网信息办公室主任、国务院新闻办公室主任、国家广播电视总局局长，现任中共贵州省委书记、贵州省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He has served as Deputy Head of the Publicity Department of the CCP Central Committee, Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China, Director of the State Council Information Office, and Director of the National Radio and Television Administration. He is the current CCP Committee Secretary of Guizhou and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Guizhou Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的前任中共贵州省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Xu Lin as CCP Committee Secretary of Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的前任国家广播电视总局局长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Xu Lin as Director of the National Radio and Television Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的继任国家广播电视总局局长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, successor of Xu Lin as Director of the National Radio and Television Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的前任国务院新闻办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Xu Lin as Director of the State Council Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的继任国务院新闻办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, successor of Xu Lin as Director of the State Council Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的前任国家互联网信息办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Xu Lin as Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，徐麟的继任国家互联网信息办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, successor of Xu Lin as Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，时任中共贵州省委副书记、省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, serving as Deputy Secretary of the CCP Guizhou Provincial Committee and Governor of Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟出生于上海市南汇县。
description.en: Xu Lin was born in Nanhui County, Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟于1982年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xu Lin joined the Communist Party of China in September 1982.

description.zh-cn: 1982年10月毕业于上海师范学院（现上海师范大学）政教系共青团工作专业。
description.en: Graduated in October 1982 from the Department of Political Education, specializing in Communist Youth League work, at Shanghai Normal College (now Shanghai Normal University).

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京政治学院

description.zh-cn: 2001年毕业于中国人民解放军南京政治学院上海分院经济管理专业。
description.en: Graduated in 2001 from the Shanghai branch of PLA Nanjing Political College with a major in Economic Management.

description.zh-cn: 2006年毕业于中欧国际工商学院高层管理人员工商管理专业。
description.en: Graduated in 2006 from the Executive MBA program at China Europe International Business School (CEIBS).

description.zh-cn: 2007年5月，时任上海市委书记习近平在介绍新当选市委常委的徐麟时，称其为“领导班子里面最年轻的一位”。
description.en: In May 2007, Xi Jinping, then Party Secretary of Shanghai, introduced the newly elected member of the Standing Committee, Xu Lin, highlighting him as 'the youngest member of the leadership team'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
国家互联网信息办公室
中国共产党贵州省委员会
贵州省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 徐麟作为中共贵州省委书记，向中共中央总书记习近平负责。
description.en: As the CCP Committee Secretary of Guizhou, Xu Lin is subordinate to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 国家互联网信息办公室主任、国务院新闻办公室主任、国家广播电视总局局长
position.en: Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China, Director of the State Council Information Office, Director of the National Radio and Television Administration

description.zh-cn: 徐麟在担任国家互联网信息办公室、国务院新闻办公室、国家广播电视总局的负责人期间，这些机构均隶属于时任总理李克强领导的国务院。
description.en: While Xu Lin served as the head of the Cyberspace Administration of China, the State Council Information Office, and the National Radio and Television Administration, these agencies were under the State Council led by then-Premier Li Keqiang.

position.zh-cn: 中共贵州省委副书记、贵州省省长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of the CCP Guizhou Provincial Committee, Governor of Guizhou

description.zh-cn: 李炳军担任中共贵州省委副书记，是省委书记徐麟的副手。
description.en: Li Bingjun serves as the Deputy Secretary of the CCP Guizhou Provincial Committee, acting as the deputy to Provincial Party Secretary Xu Lin.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟接替谌贻琴出任中共贵州省委书记。
description.en: Xu Lin succeeded Shen Yiqin as the CCP Committee Secretary of Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟接替聂辰席出任国家广播电视总局局长。
description.en: Xu Lin succeeded Nie Chenxi as the Director of the National Radio and Television Administration.

description.zh-cn: 曹淑敏接替徐麟出任国家广播电视总局局长。
description.en: Cao Shumin succeeded Xu Lin as the Director of the National Radio and Television Administration.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟接替蒋建国出任国务院新闻办公室主任。
description.en: Xu Lin succeeded Jiang Jianguo as the Director of the State Council Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 孙业礼接替徐麟出任国务院新闻办公室主任。
description.en: Sun Yeli succeeded Xu Lin as the Director of the State Council Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 徐麟接替鲁炜出任国家互联网信息办公室主任和中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Xu Lin succeeded Lu Wei as Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China and Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 庄荣文接替徐麟出任国家互联网信息办公室主任和中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Zhuang Rongwen succeeded Xu Lin as Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China and Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.
